import './HowToBuy.css' import GenericBanner from '../../components/GenericBanner/GenericBanner.js' function HowToBuy(){ return( <>

HOW IT WORKS

At Zeroto60s, we've created an efficient buying process to ensure simplicity and security for both buyers and sellers.

Step 1 -SIGN UP- Sign up with Zeroto60s account and securely link your payment card. Rest assured, the card only be charged if you emerge as the successful bidder

Step 2 -SEARCH- Simply use our seach bar to find and browse through the watches that catch your interest. Once you've found the perfect pieces you want to bid on, take your time to read the descriptions and details carefully. You can also ask the seller directly using our chat platform.

Step 3 -BID- Join the live bidding action by entering the next step, please keep in mind that a buyer's fee of 6% of the sales price (+state tax) will be charged to your card upon winning. Zeroto60s reserves the right to authorize a hold on your card for the buyer's fee amount. This ensures that you have sufficient funds in case you win the auction. Please note that this is not a charge, but a temporary authorizion, and you will only be charged if you emerge as the winner.

Step 4 -STAY ALERT- We willl you informed in case of being outbid, enabling you to place another bid. To avoid last minute bidding(snipping), any bid within the final 2 minutes of the auction will reset the clock to 2 minutes.

Step 5 -VICTORY- If you emerge as the highes bidder when the auction concludes, you will be declared the victorious winner. The buyer's premium will be automatically billed to your register payment card and hold in an Escrow account. You will be introduce to the seller to arrange the shipping method and start your 7 days inspection period.

) } export default HowToBuy;
